content: the triangular pattern is designed to repeat so you can continue the repeating pattern until the desired size of shawl is achieved the rectangular repeating pattern can be used for anything from a rectangle shawl pillow/cushion cover table runner table cloth placemat dresser cover or as a larger item for across the end of the bed this pattern is for beginning to intermediate crocheters there are small charts in each row of the written pattern to assist with visualising the order of stitches on one side of the shawl and the placement of stitches relative to the row below photos of each row are also in the document pattern alternates between flower lacework and a chain pattern you can follow me on twitter https //twitter com/lil_psychotic instagram https //www instagram com/lil_psychotic73/ pintrest https //www pinterest com au/kirstenbishop50/ facebook https //www facebook com/lilpsychoticdesigner/ https //www facebook com/groups/kirstenbishopdesigns/
